definitions.definition: Burdensome or hindering , as if a weight or drag ; vexatious .
Not easily managed or handled ; awkward ; clumsy .
examples: Cumbersome machines can endanger operators and slow down production.

definitions.definition: Hard, difficult, demanding to handle or get around with.
examples: A slave’s work was as cumbersome as toiling on the fields, or in the mines.

main_definition: Burdensome or hindering , as if a weight or drag ; vexatious .
secondary_definitions: Not easily managed or handled ; awkward ; clumsy .
Hard, difficult, demanding to handle or get around with.
